Title: Relates to the site selection of community facilities in cities with a population of one million or more
Summary: Relates to the site selection of community facilities in cities with a population of one million or more by municipalities; includes group homes, homeless shelters, detention centers, drug rehabilitation and detoxification centers, halfway houses, wastewater treatment plants, sewage facilities, waste transfer stations, landfills, power plants and chemical processing plants.
LawCode: Add ยง239-j, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to the site selection of community facilities in cities with a population of one million or more
